type.description:
The type of connection being used. 

The value for this property MUST come from the connection-type-enum enumeration.

x.description:
This property represent the X coordinates of the connection. It MUST contain at least one value for a straight line. 

This property is strongly connected with the y property. Both x and y lists MUST have the same number of elements (as they together create a point on the canvas).

y.description:
This property represent the Y coordinates of the connection. It MUST contain at least one value for a straight line. 

This property is strongly connected with the x property. Both x and y lists MUST have the same number of elements (as they together create a point on the canvas).
